title: one
description: Suit Ruth Kramer wore to her elopement with Bill Kramer.  Ruth did not make the suit specifically for the wedding, but had recently completed the suit when she and her then fiancé decided to elope.  Featured: Bill Kramer
subject: Suit; Wedding; Charcoal; Gray; 1963; 1960's

title: two
description: Wedding dress for Ruth Kramer's oldest daughter, Marti Suddarth.  The dress features a long train, buttons down the back, and sheer sleeves.  Featured: Daniel Suddarth
subject: Wedding; Wedding Dress; Gown; Train; White; 1985; 1980's; Round Neckline; Sheer Sleeves; long-sleeved

title: three
description: Wedding dress for Ruth Kramer's oldest daughter, Marti Suddarth.  The dress features a long train, buttons down the back, and sheer sleeves.
subject: Wedding; Wedding Dress; Gown; Train; White; 1985; 1980's; Round Neckline; Sheer Sleeves; long-sleeved

title: four
description: Usher dress, bridesmaid dress, and maternity bridesmaid dress Ruth Kramer sewed for her daughters Alice Doane, Nancy Kramer, and Marti Suddarth at her second daughter's wedding.  The usher dress is a dark velvet with puffed sleeves.  The bridesmaid dress is a purple taffeta with a natural waist and puff sleeves.  The maternity bridesmaid dress has a similar design with a raised waistline to accommodate Marti Suddath's pregnancy.
subject: Bridesmaid; Purple; Taffeta; Maternity; Velvet; 1988; 1980's

title: five
description: Tea-length, white, lacy wedding dress with long-sleeved, puffed shoulders, and a square neckline.
subject: Wedding; Wedding Dress; Gown; Tea-Length; White; 1988; 1980's; Square Neckline; Puffed Sleeves; long-sleeved

title: six
description: Maternity bridesmaid dress Ruth Kramer sewed for her daughter, Marti Suddarth, for her daughter Emily Eberhardt's wedding.  The purple taffeta dress features a raised waistline, a v-neckline, and puffed sleeves.  Featured: Daniel Suddarth and Kate Suddarth
subject: Bridesmaid; Purple; Taffeta; Maternity; 1988; 1980's
for: Alice Doane, Nancy Kramer, Marti Suddarth
